name: Flying Ame
description:
You can play more smoothly by downloading this game!(downloading file is below)

How To Play

click : shot, R:Respond

you can groundpound enemies to bump with your body from above!(This requires a minimum velocity) ,you can get back your ammo and sometimes enemis drop a item.

you can clear this game to meet with Nabi Mama!

It's so hard to  clear.. HaHaHa

Good Luck!

Items 

:add max ammo. :reduce reload delay. :add shot power. :add the number of bullets to get back.
